document.full_text: zaza pachulia of the atlanta hawks and orlando magic's jason richardson have each been suspended one game for fighting in a protracted exchange during the playoffs, the nba said on saturday.
document.title: pachulia and richardson suspended one game for fighting
lines_and_colors: zaza pachulia of the atlanta hawks and orlando magic's jason richardson have each been suspended one game for fighting in a protracted exchange during the playoffs, the nba said on saturday.
